title: Enhancing Practical Business Strategy Competencies: Mixed Reality-Based Anatomical Practice Team Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomy Terminology and Understanding of Human Body Structure
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify human anatomical structures in 3D within a mixed-reality environment.
Learners evaluate their ability to apply anatomical knowledge to clinical cases through team-based problem-solving.
Learners explain the location and functions of major organs with 90% accuracy in VR/AR simulations.
Learners perform a core structure exploration protocol within 10 minutes using digital anatomy tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
